Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion due to signal problems at 63rd Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion due to signal problems at 63rd Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Skokie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
